participant_1.name: Diego Ramirez
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate, with a love for languages and music. He enjoys exploring different cultures through his studies.
participant_1.background: one of the languages that i am currently studying is spanish. my next language to study is french. my favorite spanish word is trabajo. i'm a musician.

participant_2.name: Lila Chen
participant_2.personality: Calm and introspective, Lila is deeply connected to her spirituality and values mindfulness in her daily life.
participant_2.background: i like meditation. i live in alaska. i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i'm a buddhist. i have not spoken in three months.
